Function.doc:
Ask the user to select a register and save the paste buffer
to that register.

Parameters:
* None

Returns:
* True if the operation succeeded, otherwise false
stripped_doc: Ask the user to select a register and save the paste buffer
Function.desc: Ask the user to select a register and save the paste buffer
returns: * True if the operation succeeded, otherwise false
Function.name: queryAndSavePasteBuffer

desc: Allow the saving of the pastebuffer to registers identified by
doc:
Allow the saving of the pastebuffer to registers identified by
letters of the alphabet, and sequently loading it from those
registers.

parameters: * enable - Boolean indicating whether debugging should be on

Method.doc:
Accepts a table of key bindings, e.g.:
  {
    save = {{"cmd", "alt"}, "s"},
    load = {{"cmd", "alt"}, "l"},
    paste = {{"cmd", "alt"}, "p"},
  }

 * table - Table of action to key mappings

Returns:
 * PasteRegister object
